src:
Pelatih Arema Anggap Madura United Tak Mudah Dikalahkan
07 Nov 2019, 10:07 by Hanum Oktavia


Pelatih Arema Anggap Madura United Tak Mudah Dikalahkan

KBRN, Malang: Arema akan kembali menjalani laga tandang melawan Madura United pada lanjutan Liga I di Stadion Kanjuruhan Malang, Jumat (8/11/2019) besok sore. Pelatih Arema, Milomir Seslija pun memberikan analisisnya soal tim lawan. Menurutnya, Laskar Sapeh julukan Madura United bukanlah lawan yang mudah dikalahkan.
“Madura United adalah tim yang sangat bagus, baik secara individu maupun tim,” kata Milo, Kamis (7/11/2019).
Menurutnya, tim yang bagus itu lantaran Madura United memiliki materi pemain yang sangat berkualitas. Selain itu,  Madura United memiliki pertahanan yang bagus. Terbukti, skuad besutan Rasiman ini tak banyak kebobolan.
“Untuk itu, pemain harus konsentrasi penuh jika ingin berada di jalur kemenangan. Kuncinya Hamkah Hamzah dan pemain lini belakang lainnya harus kerja keras jika ingin meraih poin penuh,” tutur pelatih asal Bosnia ini.
Sementara itu, salah seorang pemain Arema Arthur Cunha da Rocha sangat optimis jika tim berjuluk Singo Edan ini bisa meraih hasil maksimal.  Apalagi tim kebanggaan masyarakat Malang ini akan tampil di hadapan publik Aremania. 
“Kita bermain di hadapan suporter, untuk itu kota harus bekerja keras  agar bisa meraih kemenangan,” tandasnya.
text:
Arema Coach considers Madura United Not Easy to Beat
Nov 7, 2019, 10:07 by Hanum Oktavia


Arema Coach considers Madura United Not Easy to Beat

KBRN, Malang: Arema will return to an away match against Madura United in the continuation of League I at Kanjuruhan Stadium Malang, Friday (11/08/2019) tomorrow afternoon. Arema coach, Milomir Seslija also gave his analysis of the opposing team. According to him, Laskar Sapeh's nickname Madura United is not an easy opponent to defeat.
"Madura United is a very good team, both individually and as a team," Milo said, Thursday (11/07/2019).
According to him, the good team was because Madura United had very high quality player material. Apart from that, Madura United has a good defense. Evidently, the squad made by Rasiman did not concede much.
"For that, players must concentrate fully if they want to be on the winning track. The key is Hamkah Hamzah and other back line players must work hard if they want to win full points, "said the Bosnian coach.
Meanwhile, one of the Arema players Arthur Cunha da Rocha is very optimistic that the team nicknamed Singo Edan can achieve maximum results. Moreover, the pride of the Malang people will appear before the Aremania public.
"We play in front of supporters, for that the city must work hard in order to win," he said.
